Etic Training Camp 2016 "Web Part"

Introduction

First of all i want to say Thank you for etic club for organizing such a great event, it was really an interesting training camp, without forgetting the team that was under my belt you were a nice team and i enjoyed working with every one of you. Now let’s start talking about what we’ve done in a nutshell.

#### HTML(Hyper Text Markup Language) : HTML is the language used to structure web pages, every single web page is initialy an HTML page .( learn more )

Here is the snippet of code used to explain HTML and some essential tags used during the training camp:

CSS(Cascading Style Sheet) :

A language used to style HTML pages from changing the background color to margins,padding,font size etc.( learn more)

JS(JavaScript or ECMAScript):

JavaScript is the language used to handle the front-end of the web, meaning that everything related to button clicks, events and animations is done through JavaScript.( learn more )

Jquery:

Is the most known DOM manipulating library,it also takes care of browsers incompatibilities.( learn more )

Bootstrap:

Bootstrap is the number one “css framework” out there, it offers alot of components especially its grid system.( learn more )

PHP:

A scripting language that runs on the server side(back-end) , it is simple and easy to learn.( learn more )

MYSQL:

Relational Database management System(RDBMS) used simply to store data.( learn more )

How to connect mysql DB with PHP ?

well, we have many options, therefore we’ve picked the PDO way which is very simple and straight forward.
